segments.text: Hello , this is Lucie Jing calling from Lincoln Bank . May I speak to Mr Was , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , hello , Mr Was . I'm just calling about your new credit card . It has arrived with us , so you can either come to collect it , or we can send it on to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sending it won't be necessary . I'm actually coming in for a meeting with my Personal Banker this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Indeed . Is there anything I need to do before I collect it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really . But we do recommend you to read through our terms and conditions again before you sign the card , just in case there is something you aren't happy with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure it'll be fine . How about my PIN number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be sent on to you within 2 working days . Then , you can start using your new card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I'll be in later today . Thanks for calling . Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
